subject: Add Environment Variable Injection
description:
Create inject_companion_env() function to set COMPANION_ENABLED, MAESTRO_SESSION_ID, MAESTRO_SESSION_MODE env vars in container. Include MAESTRO_JWT and MAESTRO_API_URL for remote.

Files:
- Modify: maestro-cli/src/claude/session.rs

Expected: Build succeeds, env vars injected on session creation
